TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l ʌ p z ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ v i ɐ s n æ p f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b æ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɹ ɔːɹ f ɹ ʌ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n d t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ ɜː n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
